channel.title: Wrtobj Help [delta]

item.title: Wrtobj Help [delta]
item.dc:creator: @dvp999 dvp999
item.description:
@dvp999 wrote:

So, this is the originial wrtobj command but when i use it doesnt write the code into the part ob makeglobalobject in client.java. Please fix this im using delta.

[code]if(command.startsWith(“wrtobj”) && playerRights >= 3){

		BufferedWriter bw = null;
		
		try{
		
			int newObject = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7));
			
			if(newObject >= 0){
				makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, newObject, 1, 10);
				bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("config//objectspawn.txt",
					true));
				bw.write("makeGlobalObject(" + absX + ", " + absY + ", " + newObject + ", 1, 10);");
				bw.newLine();
				bw.flush(); 
			} else {
				sM("No such object.");
			}
		} catch (Exception e) {
			sM("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::wrtobj 1");
		}
		
	}[/code]

Read full topic
